sentences.sContent: When she refused his advances he had her sent to a brothel.
sentences.sContent_eng: When she refused his advances he had her sent to a brothel.
sentences.sCn: 在遭到阿嘉莎的拒绝后，他把她送到了一所妓院之中。

sentences.sContent: After some period of time, she will be resold to another brothel owner, often in another country, and the cycle will continue all over again.
sentences.sContent_eng: After some period of time, she will be resold to another brothel owner, often in another country, and the cycle will continue all over again.
sentences.sCn: 经过一段时间以后，她可能又被转卖给另一个国家的另一个妓院老板，于是循环将再重复一遍。

trans.tranOther: a house where men pay to have sex with  prostitute s
